channel.title: Problems on KickSolved - Pre-Order App Solutions to Daily Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Problems on KickSolved - Pre-Order App Solutions to Daily Problems

item.title: Configuring Webcam is Hard
item.description: The Webcam admin pages are for experts only.

item.title: You need a PhD
item.description: Doing the washing should not be hard. Different family members have different skill sets when it comes to selecting the correct washing programme.

item.title: The Problem: Generating New Revenue
item.description: Hardware & services margins are disappearing. Customers are lost regarding Cloud, Big Data, AI, BlockChain, etc. Keeping up with innovation is hard work. Get behind and risk that Google and co. disrupt your business. Many IT solutions but few paying customer problems. Generating new revenues is your top problem.

item.title: Why a separate key pad?
item.description: Always changing batteries! Drilling walls! Difficult codes to remember?

item.title: A family member eats when nobody sees it?
item.description: Sneaky snacker at home? Can’t control them?

item.title: Fridge Without Electricity?
item.description: Why is it that your fridge always has a problem when you are on holiday?

item.title: Ordering groceries takes time
item.description: It takes lots of time to order groceries. Make list. Go to shop.

item.title: Useless Electric Meter?
item.description: Is your Electric Meter just showing one overall number?

item.title: Children & Internet
item.description:
Pre-teens wasting time online. Parents can not restrict the time spend on games, Netflix,…
Allow homework friendly sites all day.

item.title: What is the WiFi password?
item.description:
Guests arriving to your home ask the question all the time.
There must be a better way than turning your WiFi upside down…
